control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the at-2 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement at-2.

implemented-requirements.description: Cybrary provides a complete catalog of security awareness and role-based security training. Cybrary also tracks the training completed by each user. Cybrary content can be tailored for annual security awareness.

Cybrary provides a complete catalog of security awareness, role-based security training, and vendor training. Cybrary also tracks the training completed by each user. Cybrary content can be tailored for annual security awareness. 
Cybrary version 4.5 is being used by system Admins.
